mapper.select: select ifnull(round(avg(rating),0),0) from review where productNum=#{num}
select ifnull(count(*),0) from review where productNum=#{num}

select count(*) from review
where ${searchcolumn} like concat('%',#{searchword},'%')

select r.subject, r.content, r.rating, r.createdAt, r.publicOption, r.reviewImageUrl, r.productNum, r.userNum, p.name, u.nickname, u.profileImage from review r inner join product p on r.productNum = p.num inner join jogong.user u on u.num = r.userNum where r.productNum = #{productNum}
